endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: prompt

param_schema.title: Prompt
param_schema.description: Vocabulary: provide names, acronyms and loanwords in a list. Use punctuation for best accuracy.

parameters.description: Vocabulary: provide names, acronyms and loanwords in a list. Use punctuation for best accuracy.

parameters.name: file_url

param_schema.title: File Url
param_schema.description: Or provide: A direct audio file URL

parameters.description: Or provide: A direct audio file URL

parameters.name: hf_token

param_schema.title: Hf Token
param_schema.description: Provide a hf.co/settings/token for Pyannote.audio to diarise the audio clips. You need to agree to the terms in 'https://huggingface.co/pyannote/speaker-diarization-3.1' and 'https://huggingface.co/pyannote/segmentation-3.0' first.

parameters.description: Provide a hf.co/settings/token for Pyannote.audio to diarise the audio clips. You need to agree to the terms in 'https://huggingface.co/pyannote/speaker-diarization-3.1' and 'https://huggingface.co/pyannote/segmentation-3.0' first.

parameters.name: language

param_schema.title: Language
param_schema.description: Language of the spoken words as a language code like 'en'. Leave empty to auto detect language.

parameters.description: Language of the spoken words as a language code like 'en'. Leave empty to auto detect language.

parameters.name: batch_size

param_schema.title: Batch Size
param_schema.description: Batch size for inference. (Reduce if face OOM error)

parameters.description: Batch size for inference. (Reduce if face OOM error)

parameters.name: file_string

param_schema.title: File String
param_schema.description: Either provide: Base64 encoded audio file,

parameters.description: Either provide: Base64 encoded audio file,

parameters.name: num_speakers

param_schema.title: Num Speakers
param_schema.description: Number of speakers, leave empty to autodetect.

parameters.description: Number of speakers, leave empty to autodetect.

parameters.name: group_segments

param_schema.title: Group Segments
param_schema.description: Group segments of same speaker shorter apart than 2 seconds

parameters.description: Group segments of same speaker shorter apart than 2 seconds

parameters.name: offset_seconds

param_schema.title: Offset Seconds
param_schema.description: Offset in seconds, used for chunked inputs

parameters.description: Offset in seconds, used for chunked inputs

parameters.name: transcript_output_format

param_schema.description: Specify the format of the transcript output: individual words with timestamps, full text of segments, or a combination of both.

parameters.description: Specify the format of the transcript output: individual words with timestamps, full text of segments, or a combination of both.

endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model (idempotent creation).

schema.title: Response Cancel Predictions  Prediction Id  Cancel Post
